            <tei-zone points="1688,2187 1676,2205 1377,2231 1377,2219 1098,2219 1098,1759 1683,1759" id="eSc_textblock_bca02c58" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1394,2253 1448,2283 1710,2300 1710,2458 1560,2481 1517,2534 1442,2534 1401,2564 1007,2564 1005,2558 794,2552 781,2522 677,2517 671,2483 634,2464 518,2446 488,2369 494,2247 498,2244 1304,2244" id="eSc_textblock_80ba3e2b" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6a9b7b41" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Rhythmic beat of a Gaucho dance
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>-<tei-seg type="slogan" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type">when Phanom Fingers play</tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_d7c2159d" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>These are the
            <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                Phantom<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Hands
            </tei-seg> of
            <tei-seg ana="#immortality" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                a thousand
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>immortal pianists; their
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>glorious genius preserv-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ed forever
            </tei-seg>,
            <tei-seg ana="#miracle" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                through the<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>miracle of <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon*</tei-name>
                reproduction.
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
            <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_4cbe38c0" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Wild abandon of a peasant
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>song; lure of a Venetian love-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>lyric; simple charm of a plantation
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>melody - who but the world's
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>greatest masters can interpret these
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>as a true music-lover demands?
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Why should you accept less when
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>you can have a <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name>?
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Why should you be satisfied with
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>any but the greatest of reproducing
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>instruments with its hundreds of
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>world-famous pianists?
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>What a Christmas gift! The
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_bca02c58" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                phantom fingers
            </tei-seg>
            of
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Paderewski</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116014490" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">De<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Pachmann</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/11918625X" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Hofmann</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116327642" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Gabrilowitsch</tei-persName>,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>and scores of others -
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#home" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                playing in your own home
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-seg ana="#touch_of_a_button" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                whenever you wish.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>See the
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon*</tei-name> today.
            <tei-seg ana="#invisibility" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                It
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>is invisible
            </tei-seg>
            and does not interfere
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>with manual playing. It is obtain-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>able in practically every good make
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of piano, both grand and upright.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Write for interesting brochure,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Auto-Pneumatic Action Co.</tei-orgName>
            <tei-persName data-origname="persName">W. C.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Heaton</tei-persName>, President, <tei-address data-origname="address">12th Avenue at
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>51st Street, New York.</tei-address>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_80ba3e2b" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>(Licensee)</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Hear it–in comparison. There's a nearby dealer
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>*Licensed under the original <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon</tei-name> patents.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_5e73ca70" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_76fba554" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs" data-empty=""/>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
